subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Russell Latapy and Dwight Yorke exacted some revenge against the United States on Wednesday, each scoring in the second half to give the Trinidad and Tobago Soca Warriors a 2-1 victory over the United States in a World Cup qualifier in Port of Spain, Trinidad. The United States had already clinched a berth in next year’s six-nation regional finals, and fielded a young team.
